rows.label: qev070105_MSG0001
rows.name: Who are you? Another of their assassins?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0002
rows.name:
After what happened to the last guy they sent,
I'm impressed you had the l::#5a»@x* to try me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0010
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that you are not an assassin.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what that strange word was.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0003
rows.name:
Wup, wup? Well, who in the name of Sir Isaac H.
Newton are you then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm not here to give lessons to people trying to kill me.
I'll fry you to a crisp, same as your friend from before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Wup, wup? You're...uh...not attacking me.
Why aren't you attacking me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0006
rows.name:
What? You're a BLADE?
...Yeah, I've heard of 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm. Now that I get a better look at you,
you do look rather a«p%*8o...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0008
rows.name:
Interesting... Yes... And since Veven's practically useless,
maybe this person can help get the y#$k+\\\\••*...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0009
rows.name:
Right then! You there, kid! Pay attention!
My name is Professor B°&7k%±l.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0010
rows.name:
If you're looking for work, I've a truly amazing offer
for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask the professor what a«p%*8o means.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask the professor what a y#$k+\\\\••* is.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0011
rows.name: Huh? You people don't say that? Hmm, how to put it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0012
rows.name:
In plain English, I'd say it's something like...
well, let's just say "eager to help."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0013
rows.name:
Oh, you heard me talking to myself, did you?
Probably best for us both if you don't know any more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0014
rows.name: This language barrier is getting to be a real hassle...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0015
rows.name:
Half the words from the planet I came from aren't even
pronounceable in your language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0016
rows.name:
I can't even properly introduce myself around here!
...Well, there's really nothing for it, I guess.
Just "Professor B" will have to do for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0017
rows.name: So then! About this job I have for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0018
rows.name:
I need a few things for my current research,
and I'd appreciate if you could secure them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0019
rows.name:
Should be simple enough for you, hmm?
Especially if I pay you for your trouble?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0050
rows.name: Ask about Needs

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0051
rows.name: Inquire as to what Professor B wants.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0060
rows.name: Ask about Studies

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Professor B what he is researching.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0020
rows.name: Straight to the point, eh? Professionalism. I like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0021
rows.name:
First, I'd like you to head west to Waterway Tangle
and collect some tykki sap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, and this project is highly time-sensitive,
so please do make it fast, all right, kid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0023
rows.name: I like a kid with a healthy sense of scientific curiosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0024
rows.name:
But keeping this one a secret is good for both our
health, if you catch my drift.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0025
rows.name:
All you need to know is that I need tykki sap.
Head west to Waterway Tangle to find some.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0026
rows.name:
My work is nothing you need to be worried about,
so what do you say? Help me out, kid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0027
rows.name:
You will?! Great! I KNEW you had a touch of
a«p%*8o about you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0028
rows.name:
I've been shorthanded lately, what with my assistant
Veven wasting his time repairing that silly spaceship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0029
rows.name:
Anyway, thanks. We're both wanderers through space
stranded on this rock. Gotta help one another out, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0030
rows.name:
The stuff I need is sap from the tykki tree.
You know of Waterway Tangle, west of the city?
You should be able to find the sap there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0031
rows.name:
You BLADEs specialize in this kind of work, don't you?
So off you go, then! Quick as you like![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0070
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0071
rows.name: Nod and tell Professor B to leave it to you.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0080
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask about Professor B's past.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0032
rows.name: Thanks. I need to complete this sucker as soon as I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0033
rows.name:
I've grown accustomed enough to life on Mira, but...
Well, there's no place like home, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0034
rows.name: Sorry, kid, but I don't trust you with that info just yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0035
rows.name: There are just too many people out to get me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0036
rows.name: Ah, you're back! Got that tykki sap for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0037
rows.name:
Great! Now all I need is a body frame and I can get
this y#$k+\\\\••* up and running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0038
rows.name:
...Whuzzat? Somebody named Gadd attacked you
while you were out looking for this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0039
rows.name:
That's probably my fault.
He's been after my technology for a while now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0040
rows.name:
He must have realized he was no match for me directly
and decided to pump you for information instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0090
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Professor B about his technology.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0100
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0101
rows.name: Express concern for Professor B's safety.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0041
rows.name:
Put it this way, the stuff inside my brain would make a
Ma-non's head explode. They're still banging rocks
together by comparison.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0042
rows.name:
Ha! You think anyone from this time period could take
me? ...Still, that's nice of you. Thanks, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0043
rows.name:
I guess after the trouble I caused, I could make a
special exception and tell you who I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0044
rows.name: Try to hang on to your socks...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0045
rows.name:
I came from the distant terminus of time and space...
I am from the future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0046
rows.name:
Gah ha ha! I might be what you humans will look like
a few hundred million years down the line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0110
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0111
rows.name: Believe Professor B's claim that he came from the future.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0120
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0121
rows.name: Laugh off Professor B's impossible claim as a joke.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0047
rows.name:
Truly amazing! You accept my story just like that?
You humans certainly adapt to new situations quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0048
rows.name:
When I first told Veven, the little pill had the gall to
start laughing in my face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0049
rows.name:
But okay. Great. That makes this quick, I guess.
Thing is, I need to get back to my own time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0050
rows.name:
And to do that, I need you to find me a car to serve
as the y#$k+\\\\••* frame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0051
rows.name:
Believe me or don't, that's your call, kid.
Veven laughed even harder than you when I told him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0052
rows.name:
None of that changes the fact that I need to get back
to my own time as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0053
rows.name:
And to do THAT, I need you to find me a car to serve
as the y#$k+\\\\••* frame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0130
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask what, exactly, a y#$k+\\\\••* is.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0140
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0141
rows.name: Ask how Professor B hopes to return to his own time.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0054
rows.name:
Oh, that's right! y#$k+\\\\••* doesn't get across
in English. Hmm, how else to describe it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0055
rows.name:
It's... Well, it's a device that overcomes the absolute
wall of temporal causality. In layman's terms,
it's a time machine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0056
rows.name:
I doubt anyone in this time has figured out how to
@a%»±* a y#$k+\\\\••* yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0057
rows.name: But with me on the case, crossing time is no big deal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0058
rows.name:
I've gotten word that a fellow named Graham is selling
cars at a discount.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0059
rows.name:
Here's some cash, kid. Try to talk him into selling you
the best vehicle for the money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0060
rows.name:
Good luck. And while you're off doing that,
I'll grab the other part I'll need for this experiment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0061
rows.name:
I'm leaving the car to you, kid. Graham should be in
the parking lot in the middle of Melville Street.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0062
rows.name:
Once we have that and one other little part,
we can kick off this time-machine test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0063
rows.name:
Assuming I can ever get in touch with my assistant,
that is! Where in the name of Sir Isaac H. Newton
has Veven gotten off to?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0106
rows.name:
Wup, wup? What in the name of Sir Isaac H. Newton?
The sucker hasn't moved an inch... Why, dammit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0107
rows.name:
I've been alive more than a thousand years,
but this is a first. What could've gone wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0108
rows.name:
Wait a minute—what are you all doing three thousand
years in the future?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0109
rows.name:
Did you perhaps follow me here in in another of the
professor's time machines?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0110
rows.name:
Thank you for for coming, Professor.
Are you folks ready to go explore the future?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0190
rows.name: Humor

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0191
rows.name:
Play along and invite Veven out to see
the amazing world of tomorrow.

rows.label: qev070105_JNK0200
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev070105_SEL0201
rows.name: Set Veven straight.

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0111
rows.name:
The total lack of change in scenery after three thousand
years is is rather remarkable, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0112
rows.name:
It makes one wonder what happened to civilization in
all those years, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0113
rows.name:
Huh? What's that? I'm sorry, I can't hear you—my ears
are still ringing from traveling in time, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0114
rows.name:
It's all pretty amazing, don't you think?
Being Mira's first time traveler?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0115
rows.name:
Oh, will you stop talking already?! Clearly, trusting you
to pilot my machine was the biggest mistake ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0116
rows.name:
Damn... The numbers were there. It hit the threshold.
If that wasn't enough, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0117
rows.name:
Then attempting counter-y#$k+\\\\••* navigation
may be the only option left to us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0118
rows.name:
In theory, that should allow for @a%»±*,
even in a special temporal axis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0119
rows.name:
Yes, that is surely it. I'm sorry to bother you again, kid,
but could you bring me some of the topaz wine
dropped by the primordial creatures called tectinsulas?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0120
rows.name:
Get me that, and I'll drive my machine through time.
I swear it on every speck of science in my brain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0121
rows.name: The numbers were well past the threshold...so why?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070105_MSG0122
rows.name:
I'll drive that sucker to the future, no matter what!
I just need that topaz wine from you, kid.[ST:wait ]
